content.raw: Actually the documentation is all correct, those values will still have DBL_MAX. The issue was that during sensor update/publish, the implementation used to clamp to RangeMax instead of masking to DBL_INF. Do you think there's any place where the doc could be updated instead?
content.html: Actually the documentation is all correct, those values will still have DBL_MAX. The issue was that during sensor update/publish, the implementation used to clamp to RangeMax instead of masking to DBL_INF. Do you think there's any place where the doc could be updated instead?
